newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-DISCIPLINARY SITUATION IN EUROPEAN COMPETITIONS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-DISCIPLINARY SITUATION IN EUROPEAN COMPETITIONS.

text.p: The following list shows players with yellow cards going into this week's European Cup quarter-final second legs as well as those players suspended from playing in all three European club competitions:
Yellow cards: Julio Cesar, Wolfgang Feiersinger, Heiko Herrlich, Andreas Moeller, Matthias Sammer
Yellow cards: Sabri Lamouchi, Lilian Laslandes, Bernard Diomede, Philippe Violeau, Frank Rabarivony, Taribo West, Antoine Sibierski, Frederic Danjou, Lionel Charbonnier, Alain Goma
Yellow cards: Mario Melchiot, Roderick Turpijn, Menno Willems, Tijani Babangida
Yellow cards: Milinko Pantic, Santi, Roberto, Toni, Radek Bejbl, Jose Luis Caminero, Pablo, Juan Vizcaino, Delfin Geli, Carlos Aguilera, Diego Simeone
Yellow cards: Gary Neville, Jordi Cruyff, David Beckham, Eric Cantona, Ole Solskjaer, Roy Keane, Denis Irwin
Porto - Suspended: Rui Barros, Sergio Conceicao, Artur Oliveira Yellow cards: Fernando Mendes, Jorge Costa, Luiz Marco, Ljubinko Drulovic, Aloisio Alves, Edmilson, Zlatko Zahovic, Jose Barroso
Yellow cards: Jon Olav Hjelde, Roar Strand, Tom Staurvik, Bent Skammelsrud, Harald Brattbakk, Bjorn Bragstad, Trond Egil Soltvedt
Yellow cards: Alen Boksic, Angelo Peruzzi, Sergio Porrini, Ciro Ferrara, Moreno Torricelli, Vladimir Jugovic, Mark Iuliano
European Cup Winners' Cup -- suspended players
Nikolas Kostenoglou (AEK Athens) v Paris St Germain
